inclusion.criterion: Histological proof of muscle-invasive transitional cell carcinoma of the bladder
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Age > 18 years at the time of consent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Females of childbearing potential and males must be willing to use an effective method of contraception
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: No prior radiotherapy to the pelvis
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: No prior malignancy is allowed except for adequately treated basal cell or squamous cell skin cancer, in situ cervical cancer, Gleason< grade 7 prostate cancers, or other cancer for which the patient has been disease-free for at least 5 years
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient is a 3-day-old Asian female infant presenting with jaundice. She was born at 38w3d of gestation, after an uncomplicated pregnancy.
